Works great on my A6 2006 sedan (limousine). I used ImgBurn, Vebatim DVD-R ver2.1/1x-16x, speed for actual burning 4x and I have MATSHITA DVD-RAM UJ-862 on my notebook. 

Just took out the onld DVD, put in the burned one, started the car and the MMI asked whether I wanted to update the software. Took about 5 minutes to get it updated. Now it is running smoothly.

Thank you Stun, great work.
